text: Hi! after launch `hs project dev` I have this error and can’t find the problem
Same code uploaded works perfect but if I try to run local development fails

Found the problem… I was running local development in sandbox but I was watching production, so looks like production is blocked if you have development locally running on other account :slightly_smiling_face:
At the moment you can only point the local dev server at one portal at a time. So if you switch to sandbox or production you'll have to restart the server and pick the right portal
<@U03FJQPSC0Y> Just wanted to follow up here- any plans for making these available in public Apps?

Hi everyone :slightly_smiling_face:

Is there a way to have a button in my React Card to upload files to the filemanager? I would like to select my file (stored on my computer) and use a POST request on '<https://api.hubapi.com/filemanager/api/v3/files/upload>' to push it to my HubSpot FileManager. So far,
• I tried to use <input type=file> : not working, error during rendering
• I also tried to use fs.createReadStream(local_path) : error, my file cannot be found -_- 
Any ideas ?

Thx a lot !
Hey Charly, it's not possible today. Thank you for bringing up the use cases, we will consider this when we are thinking about file upload options in the future.
